title: Championship Jewel Question
body:
I've ran into a problem regarding the Championship Jewels.

I've acquired 22 Championship Jewels and they are currently sitting in my Material Inventory. 

I am currently at a loss on what I am supposed to do with them. I do not get a response when I click on them, only an item description from hovering the mouse over it.

If anyone has any knowledge on how to proceed and what I should do, it would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body:
I'm not aware of any plan to allow anything else to be done with this past crafting the Icons. According to our [FAQ page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-), the materials will expire and will be removed on November 6th. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
How do you craft the icons? I am currently just stuck with the materials.

You grab one of the 2016 LCS Team icons and then hop into hextech crafting to upgrade the Tier 2 Icon materials to a full tier 2 icon. You can also visit the FAQ page I linked above for some visuals on how it works.
Any icon from this world championship
